duties_responsibilities.duty: Review insurance payments for calculation accuracy
Pursue additional payment from insurance plans through telephone or insurance website communication
Gain commitment from insurance plans for payment through collection efforts
Document actions using clear and concise notes according to developed standards

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred
One year of medical insurance experience required
High volume call volume experience preferred
Previous medical insurance payment follow up experience preferred
Virtual employees are required to have high speed wired internet with 25 MB download and 6 MB upload speeds
